title: Tunable Meta-Parameter
technique: Feature Extraction - eigen value & weight analysis
technique_description: Extracting eigen values from layer 2-3 for RCNN and layer 2-5 for SSD models; Extracting the aggregated weight features per channel for each model; Fine tuning each Gradient Boosting Classifiers; Training the features on the classifiers; Setting temperature variable T to tune the prediction of SSD models.
technique_changes: Seting default temperature variable T=0.9 for the SSD model predictions, adding configuration mode to the container

parameter1.description: Temperature variable for tuning the SSD model predictions only
